column4: I have a question. Why is the update server currently made of fail? I'm dling at <2000 bytes/second
server issue likely try again later
it's been like that for the whole week.
I'm just using the update star
some undersea cables were cut and most of asia and the middle east were affected, thus my question about which mirror
I see. no clue. I'm just clicking the star.
next time try sudo apt-get update then sudo apt-get upgrade see if that makes a difference
that would be set in the router
wait; you want to use wireless and wired?
what chipset for the wireless card
what does ifconfig show in terminal; two entries or three
it shows four. lo, eth0, wlan0, and wmaster0-00.
what does sudo dhclient wlan0 return (dhcpoffers or none, sleeping)
